divs: Sighting Details This is my first real experience observing a UFO I lived in the country for 8 years and seen some unusual things in the sky but this was different.I was just after 10pm on Sunday may 19 Dad and I were standing outside and observed an orange to red glowing ball moving across the sky at a moderate to slow speed it continue on a path from SE to NW and eventually just fade in the distance sky this lasted approx 11 mins and the glowing object didn't make any unusual move it moved in a straight steady line Very strange.Both Dad and I are struck with wonderment.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waterford
This sighting has never been favorited.
